title: If there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message as a reminder.
OB: When creating a chart and setting the data definition, if a selected column does not have any data, the system should display a user-friendly error message to remind the user.
EB: Currently, when selecting a column without any data, no error message is displayed.
SR: The system should be updated to show a user-friendly error message when a selected column does not have any data.
